keyword: how many calories in a royal gala apple
title: How Many Calories in a Royal Gala Apple?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a royal gala apple, including carbs, fiber, sugars, protein, fat, and quick tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a Royal Gala Apple?
assumptions: Medium-sized Royal Gala apple (~182 g with skin), raw, unpeeled, no added toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by apple size, ripeness, variety, and storage; organic vs. conventional may differ slightly. Check produce labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One medium Royal Gala apple provides ~95 kcal and ~4.4 g fiber.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a royal gala apple?
faqs.a: About 95 kcal for one medium-sized apple.

faqs.q: What's the fiber content in a Royal Gala apple?
faqs.a: Approximately 4.4 g of dietary fiber per medium apple.

faqs.q: Are Royal Gala apples low in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, only 0.3 g total fat per medium apple, with negligible saturated fat.

faqs.q: How much sugar is in one Royal Gala apple?
faqs.a: Around 18.9 g of natural sugars per medium apple.

faqs.q: Does apple size affect calories in a Royal Gala?
faqs.a: Yesâ€”small apples ~70 kcal, large ~115 kcal; adjust based on weight.
